Enumeration Type Documentation

enum Group_type

A convenient type allowing to group options.

Enumerator:
GENERIC 

a generic group of options allowed for all commands

CONFIG 

configuration options

ENV 

environment variables

HIDDEN 

options that will not shown to the user
